participant_1.name: Emma

participant_1.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live in a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is adventurous and outgoing, always looking for new experiences and loves to express his creativity through baking.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.
